version_description:
* Mi Band 3 more functions
* Fix bugs

* Mi Band 3 more functions
* Fix bugs

* Fixed Twitter and WhatsApp notifications
* Added manual selection of language for Mi Band 3
* Added Activity option for menu of Mi Band 3
* Fixed bugs

* Added notification switch to any applications (for Mi Band 3)
* Added additional information to the page "Connection"
* Added support for Mi Band 3 NFC
* Fixed crash during authorization
* Bugs fixed

* Added weather for Mi Band 3
* Added ability for display heartrate chart on sleep chart
* Fixed crash when open Inactivity notification
* Fixed call id display on Mi Band 3 
* Fixed finding phone with locked screen
* Fixed bugs

* Updated weather page (Added Yandex weather)
* Fixed bugs

* Added support for Mi Band 4 (only works when Mi Fit is installed!)
* Bugs fixed

* Support for Mi Band 5
* Fixed bugs
